examples.description: Generate a MoveCommand in your myapp CLI application
Generate a MoveCommand in your myapp CLI application but do not export it from index.ts

examples.command: nx g @gb-nx/cli:move --project myapp --parameter one --paramter two --option three
examples.description: Generate a MoveCommand in your myapp CLI application with the supplied parameters and option

path.description: The path at which to create the command file, relative to the current workspace. Default is a folder with the same name as the pipe in the project root.

project.x-prompt: What project would you like to target?

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the command?

flat.description: Create the new files at the top level of the current project.

export.description: Specifies if the command should be exported from the project's entry point
